title: Byeol Gaming
body:
Byeol Gaming
Introducing a new organisation new team, new start looking to compete in the OOL.
If you are up to the challenge got what it takes to possibly make it to the OPL here it is right now, come join me.
Positions that Byeol Gaming is offering are:
• Head coach
• Coach (under head coach)
• Manager
• Analyst
• Media marketer
• Top Laner
• Jungler
• Mid Laner
• ADC
• Support
• #1sub
• #2sub
Please add Dela Cruz or delacruztheking

replies.body:
Hey man
i just came from Na i was d4 so i came to oce and had to start again it sucks but its alright i am silver 3 atm
My main role is ADC i can mid a bit
but try hit me up or i add u :)
I am happy to be a sub .. cheers

love to play mid lane for a good team 
IGN : Dad Ganked Mum 
plat 4 atm
im keen for supporting plus i like the idea of something serious ING DABEEFWARBOSS
What kind of level are you looking for players to be at? Plat now but climbed from silver this season
Looking for players determined to treat it as a serious organisation and to turn up for trainings and such, ranks dont really matter but it would be prefered to be about diamond standard
When i get home from work I'll add you. Interested in coach/analyst position. Have experience, but none in the last 12 months
thats fine mate, nothing bad about trying for the position :) GL
